data.title: Undisputed Boxing Game Coming to Xbox and PS5 in October 2024
data.meta_description: Excitement is building for the upcoming release of Undisputed, the much-anticipated boxing game set to launch on October 11, 2024, for PlayStation 5 and Xbox
data.text:
Excitement is building for the upcoming release of Undisputed, the much-anticipated boxing game set to launch on October 11, 2024, for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S. This will be the first major boxing game in over a decade, and fans have been eagerly waiting for its debut. Players can expect true-to-life visuals and bone-jarring action, along with an extensive roster of licensed boxers.

Undisputed promises a rich gaming experience with its Career Mode, Character Creator, and Fighter Select Customization. These features allow players to immerse themselves in the world of boxing like never before. The game has been in early access for some time and has impressed players with its realistic depiction of boxing.

Developed by Steel City Interactive and published by Deep Silver, Undisputed will be available in two editions: Standard and Deluxe WBC. Pre-ordering will also grant players access to a bonus fighter which adds even more excitement to the release. October can’t come soon enough for boxing and gaming fans alike.

Get Ready to Rumble! Undisputed Boxing Game Details

Boxing fans, get ready to lace up your gloves, because Undisputed is stepping into the ring on October 11, 2024. This isn’t just another boxing game; it’s a knockout experience coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam.

What Makes Undisputed a Champ?

Undisputed isn’t pulling any punches. It boasts an impressive roster of over 200 fighters, including both male and female boxers. You’ll find legends like Muhammad Ali and Sugar Ray Leonard, alongside current stars like Tyson Fury and Canelo Alvarez. The game also features a deep career mode, letting you create your own fighter and climb the ranks to become a champion.

Knockout Features

Undisputed packs a punch with its features. The game utilizes a revolutionary footwork system, allowing for unprecedented control and movement in the ring. It also boasts a realistic physics engine, making every punch feel impactful. Plus, with over 60 different punches and combinations, you’ll have plenty of ways to knock out your opponents.

Multiple Game Modes

Undisputed isn’t just about one-on-one fights. You can also compete in online tournaments, exhibition matches, and even create your own custom tournaments. The game also features a comprehensive tutorial mode, teaching you the ropes and helping you master the art of boxing.

Release Date and Platforms

So, mark your calendars for October 11, 2024, and get ready to step into the ring with Undisputed. This is one boxing game you won’t want to miss.

Key Takeaways

Undisputed release date: October 11, 2024.

Realistic visuals and extensive features.

Available in Standard and Deluxe versions.

Game Overview and Features

Undisputed, the highly anticipated boxing game, is developed by Steel City Interactive and published by Deep Silver. This game is set to be released across multiple platforms including PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S in October 2024. It offers various gaming modes and true-to-life visuals.

Developers and Publishers

Undisputed is brought to you by Steel City Interactive (SCI), a developer known for creating realistic sports games. The game is published by Deep Silver, a well-established publisher in the gaming industry. Their collaboration aims to deliver a top-notch boxing experience that appeals to both casual players and hardcore boxing fans.

Platform Availability

The game will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. This wide platform availability ensures that a large audience can enjoy the game regardless of their preferred gaming system. Players who pre-order specific editions will have access to exclusive content and early play opportunities.

Release Information

Undisputed is set for full release on October 11, 2024. Players who purchase the Digital Deluxe WBC Edition can start playing early on October 8, 2024. The Physical Deluxe WBC Edition offers additional perks and is available for both PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. The early access phase began on January 31, 2023, for PC users via Steam.

Gaming Modes

Undisputed features several engaging modes:

Career Mode: Allows players to build and manage their boxing career.

Character Creator: Offers extensive customization of fighters.

Fighter Select Customization: Enables detailed control over fighter attributes and appearances.

These modes enhance replayability and player engagement, making the game a comprehensive boxing experience.

Technical Aspects and Gameplay

The game releases on October 11, 2024. It includes realistic in-game mechanics, true-to-life graphics and audio, and a rich boxing roster.

In-Game Mechanics

The game focuses on realism. There are advanced footwork mechanics that help players move fluidly in the ring. Players can throw a variety of punches including jabs, hooks, and uppercuts.

Defensive tools play a vital role. Players can block, dodge, and perform counter-punches. The damage system is detailed with visible effects like cuts and bruises that develop over rounds. Facial deformation adds to the realistic experience. The gameplay balances offensive and defensive strategies.

Graphics and Audio

Visuals in the game stand out with true-to-life details. Venues are crafted with high-quality textures and lighting. The game offers bone-jarring action that immerses players into the experience.

The audio complements the visuals. The commentary features Todd Grisham and expert analysts, enhancing realism. Crowd noises and punch sounds are accurately depicted to create a lively atmosphere.

Boxing Roster and Licenses

The game boasts an extensive roster of licensed boxers. Players can choose from legends like Muhammad Ali and modern stars like Tyson Fury, Oleksandr Usyk, and Canelo Alvarez. Female boxing icons such as Katie Taylor and Claressa Shields are also included.

These licensed boxers enhance the game’s authenticity. Character models reflect their real-life counterparts, and special moves are incorporated. Boxing enthusiasts will find the roster diverse and exciting.
